atk-s0510a42:57_9: The mind is burning. Mental phenomena are burning. Mind-consciousness is burning. Mind-contact is burning. Whatever feelings arise because of mind-contact—whether pleasant, painful, or neither-pleasant-nor-painful—those too are burning.
